tool_description: Analyzes plumbing feasibility and requirements for kitchen fixtures based on existing infrastructure and planned locations.

existing_sink_x.description: Current sink X position in inches from room origin

existing_sink_y.description: Current sink Y position in inches from room origin

proposed_sink_x.description: Proposed sink X position in inches from room origin

proposed_sink_y.description: Proposed sink Y position in inches from room origin

dishwasher_adjacent.description: Whether dishwasher will be adjacent to sink

water_line_accessible.description: Whether existing water lines are accessible

drain_line_accessible.description: Whether existing drain lines are accessible

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Position coordinates must be positive numbers within room bounds.
Excessive relocation distance: Sink move exceeds 6 feet from existing location without major rework.
Inaccessible plumbing: Existing water or drain lines not accessible for connection.
Code violation: Proposed location violates plumbing code requirements.
usage: Compare existing and proposed sink locations to assess plumbing modification requirements and estimate complexity of changes needed.

relocation_distance.description: Distance sink is moving in feet
